summary.span: 提供类型以支持对应用程序创建的内容的版权管理，这些内容存储在 或 中。

span.span: Provides types to support rights management of application-created content such as that stored in a or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何使用和实施权限管理的其他信息中未提供联机的 MSDN 文档[Rights Management Services SDK](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74491)。Additional information about how to use and implement rights management is available online in the MSDN documentation for the [Rights Management Services SDK](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74491).
